columnAttribute.name: group_type
columnAttribute.help: Core groups are first formed with core proteins and subsequently peripheral proteins are mapped in. Residual groups are formed with peripheral proteins that fail to map to any of the core groups.

reporter.description: Display the terms in the attribute as word clouds

textAttribute.name: alveolata
textAttribute.display:
ALVEOLATA
Ciliates: $$alveolata_cili_actual$$ / $$alveolata_cili_total$$
Apicomplexa
 Haemosporida: $$alveolata_haem_actual$$ / $$alveolata_haem_total$$
 Coccidia: $$alveolata_cocc_actual$$ / $$alveolata_cocc_total$$
 Piroplasmida: $$alveolata_piro_actual$$ / $$alveolata_piro_total$$
 Other apicomplexa: $$alveolata_apic_actual$$ / $$alveolata_apic_total$$
Other alveolata: $$alveolata_alve_actual$$ / $$alveolata_alve_total$$
$$alveolata_actual$$ / $$alveolata_total$$ ($$alveolata_percent$$%)

table.name: TaxonCounts
table.help: Numbers refer to the number of proteins in that organism or taxonomic group. In order to see organisms and taxonomic groups without proteins in this ortholog group, uncheck 'Hide zero counts.'
table.description: Numbers refer to the number of proteins in that organism or taxonomic group.

table.name: Sequences
table.description:
This section features a Clustal Omega alignment tool (max 1000 sequences) and a tree visualization of proteins in this group. The proteins can be filtered in a number of ways,
  • Filter via text search on any/specific columns in the table.
  • Select one or more Pfam domains from the Pfam filter.
  • Restrict to Core Only, Peripheral Only or Core & Peripheral using the dropdown filter.
  • Filter taxonomically using the Organism filter.
The tree visualization is automatically updated with each selection. To run a Clustal Omega alignment after proteins are selected, choose the ‘Output format’ below the Protein List table and click the ‘Run Clustal Omega for selected genes’ button.

textAttribute.name: clustalInput
textAttribute.help: Select proteins to submit to clustal Omega at bottom of this table

linkAttribute.name: sequence_link
linkAttribute.help: Taxon-abbreviation|Protein-Id. Click to visit this protein's page at OrthoMCL.

table.name: SimilarGroup
table.description: Similar groups are computed by a Diamond BLASTX comparison of the Representative Sequences (centroids) of all groups with each other. Groups with pairwise BLAST scores better than 1e-5 are considered similar.

table.name: GroupStat
table.help: Group Statistics are a measure of dispersion for the proteins in an orthogroup. Percent identity values are computed with Mash (MinHash) as 3 amino acid shared kmers between all of the proteins vs. a central protein in the group.
table.description: Group Statistics are a measure of dispersion for an orthogroup. Percent identity values are computed between all of the proteins vs. a central protein in the group.
